text: God of War Ragnarök is a 2022 action-adventure game that was developed by Santa Monica Studio and was published by Sony Interactive Entertainment (PS Studios). It was released worldwide on November 9, 2022, for both the PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5, marking the first cross-gen release in the God of War series, and was released for Windows and macOS on September 19, 2024. Loosely based on Norse mythology, the game is set in an ancient Scandinavian world and features series protagonist, Kratos, and his son who is now a teenager, Atreus. title: God of War Ragnarök
